description:
Arc'teryx refined design has a distinct aesthetic. Light, fitted, and quick drying, the Skyline Shirt SS wicks moisture, stays cool and has clean, modern style highlighted by its hidden snap-front placket and contemporary architectural lines. Articulated patterning and mechanical stretch hold the fit and extend ergonomic freedom, and the soft, airy Diem™ polyester fabric is highly wrinkle resistant, making the versatile Skyline a choice for travel as well as work.

This redesign features a zippered chest pocket.
name: Arcteryx Skyline SS Shirt - Mens
